sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167230 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN , CTR_TERM_STR_DT , LSOR_FNM , CTR_TERM_END_DT , LNPB_INTRT , AMT , PNAMT , INTR_AMT , DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #txprDscmNoEncCntn# , #ctrTermStrDt# , #lsorFnm# , #ctrTermEndDt# , #lnpbIntrt# , #amt# , #pnamt# , #intrAmt# , #ddcAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167230 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN=#txprDscmNoEncCntn# , CTR_TERM_STR_DT=#ctrTermStrDt# , LSOR_FNM=#lsorFnm# , CTR_TERM_END_DT=#ctrTermEndDt# , LNPB_INTRT=#lnpbIntrt# , AMT=#amt# , PNAMT=#pnamt# , INTR_AMT=#intrAmt# , DDC_AMT=#ddcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN=#txprDscmNoEncCntn# AND CTR_TERM_STR_DT=#ctrTermStrDt#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167230 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN=#txprDscmNoEncCntn# AND CTR_TERM_STR_DT=#ctrTermStrDt#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN , CTR_TERM_STR_DT , LSOR_FNM , CTR_TERM_END_DT , LNPB_INTRT , AMT , PNAMT , INTR_AMT , DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167230 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN=#txprDscmNoEncCntn# AND CTR_TERM_STR_DT=#ctrTermStrDt#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN , CTR_TERM_STR_DT , LSOR_FNM , CTR_TERM_END_DT , LNPB_INTRT , AMT , PNAMT , INTR_AMT , DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167230 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN DESC , CTR_TERM_STR_DT DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167230 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
